title: Which is biggest Hindi rap song? - Quora

response.answer_text: When you say biggest, what's your context here? Biggest in terms of popularity? Biggest in terms of time for the track? Biggest in terms of most expensive record? Biggest in terms of how many rappers sang a rap? For any of above “Biggest”; Popularity: breathless Time: you know we the best now Expensive: lungi dance Most number of rappers: you know we the best now
I would recommend listening to Breathless by Shankar Mahadevan. A lyrical feast and beautifully sung song. Shankar Mahadevan sang the song. No more to say !
